message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get it at a competitive price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider my own costs. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $12500. It's a fair price that should work for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $12000, but that's the maximum I can afford. Can we meet at that price?
